title: The Stars Within
description: New edition of ASIN B017KIP4U0Two wars, two generations, two great loves––THE STARS WITHIN is a suspenseful tale of mothers and daughters and secrets. Lucienne has discovered a black hole as mysterious as the secrets in her own life. Her mother, a scientist as well, disappeared during World War II and was thought to be a Nazi collaborator. Lucienne never knew for sure what crimes her mother had committed but while in Paris their lives unravel around the appearance of a mysterious doctor, and the truth must be discovered before it’s too late for them both.
author: N.M. Kelby
